---
title: "About"
---

This site is designed to provide guidance, scripts and resources for sites participating in transitioning data to OMOP common data model as part of [CURE ID](https://cure.ncats.io/home)

| Authors:                                                                                                   |
|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Matthew Robinson, Paul Nagy, Michael Cook, Zack Wang, Danielle Boyce, Benjamin Martin, William Garneau[^1] |

[^1]: Johns Hopkins School of Medicine

This work was funded by the CURE ID initiative <https://cure.ncats.io>
